title: Invite and provision business member Snapshot

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Offline Front Desk Mode. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

view.title: Owner validates financial/reporting outputs
view.subtitle: Revenue sanity computed from booking orders.

blocks.title: Owner Revenue Sanity completed
blocks.message: Revenue sanity computed from booking orders.

blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

resultPayload.note: Revenue sanity computed from booking orders.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Handles phone booking while checking someone in". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.
